net.dean.jraw.models.meta

Class SubmissionSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.models.meta.SubmissionSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonSerializer<Submission>

    public final class SubmissionSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonSerializer<Submission>
    This class is responsible for serializing Submissions, since they are presented differently than other models. When a submission is requested with comments (with RedditClient.getSubmission(String) or such), then the root JSON node is actually an array containing two elements. The first is a Listing of authors (always one Account instance), and the second is a Listing of Comments.

        T - The type of object to return
        Parameters:

        Serializes a Submission with comments.
        Parameters:
